mapper.insert: insert into program(type_id, name, view) values (#{typeId}, #{name}, #{point})
mapper.select: select p.id as id, t.name as typeName, p.name as `name`, p.view as `view` from program p left join type t on p.type_id = t.id limit #{pageStart}, #{pageSize}

select p.id as id, t.name as typeName, p.name as `name`, p.view as `view`, count(pal.id) as num from program p left join type t on p.type_id = t.id left join program_actor_list pal on p.id = pal.program_id group by pal.program_id
select id from program order by id desc limit 1
